input_text:
Job Title: .Net Engineer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
About BeSmarteeBeSmartee powers $25B+ in digital mortgages every month, for some of the world’s largest lenders by delivering on its brand promise to always be innovative, configurable and reliable. BeSmartee’s digital mortgage solutions use the automation of data and processes to achieve maximum operational efficiencies and competitive advantages for retail, consumer direct and wholesale lenders. The company remains focused on its vision to deliver a 7-day mortgage close. Join BeSmartee and partner with 150+ lenders who rely on us to achieve an easy, fast and transparent digital mortgage.
Role OpportunityThe mission for the Senior .NET Engineer is to independently lead and execute end-to-end .NET development projects within our fintech company. This includes leveraging expertise in OCR technology to optimize financial processes, contributing to increased efficiency, and integrating ABBYY OCR capabilities into our systems for seamless document processing. The developer will be responsible for full-stack development, ensuring cohesive solutions, and staying current with industry trends to implement best practices. This role requires autonomy, strong problem-solving skills, and effective collaboration with cross-functional teams, ultimately playing a pivotal role in shaping and advancing our cutting-edge fintech solutions.
Open to applicants located in: AL, AZ, CA, CO, FL, ID, IL, IN, MT, OH, OR, TX, UT
QualificationsExtensive .NET Expertise: Minimum 5 years of hands-on experience in Microsoft .NET development, demonstrating proficiency in C# and ASP.NET.Recognition Engine Proficiency: Proven experience in developing and implementing Recognition Engine solutions, with a strong understanding of OCR and related technologies.ABBYY Integration: Significant experience with ABBYY technologies, including the ability to integrate ABBYY OCR capabilities into .NET applications.Independent Problem Solver: Ability to work autonomously and take ownership of projects, demonstrating a proactive and results-driven approach.Full Stack Development: Solid understanding of full-stack development principles, including front-end and back-end technologies, to ensure cohesive and well-integrated solutions.Database Management: Proficient in working with relational databases (e.g., SQL Server) and data modeling.Agile Development: Experience working in Agile/Scrum environments, with a focus on delivering high-quality software within defined timelines.Version Control Systems: Familiarity with version control systems, such as Git, to manage and track changes in codebase.Continuous Learning: Demonstrated commitment to continuous learning, staying abreast of the latest technologies, tools, and best practices in .NET development.
Benefits80% of the Employee medical base plan covered by the companyMedical, Vision, Dental, and Voluntary Life plans availableStock Based Compensation401KUnlimited PTORemote office environment with a great value driven culture
BeSmartee, Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of age, race, color, religion or religious creed, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, marital status, family or parental status, disability, military or veteran status, age, or any other basis protected by law. All employment decisions at BeSmartee are based on a person’s merit, business needs, and role requirements.

Experience Level (if available): None
